text:
Ranveer Singh-Anil Kapoor's Impromptu Dance On The Ramp Was Absolutely 'Jhakaas'!
Ranveer Singh-Anil Kapoor's Impromptu Dance On The Ramp Was Absolutely 'Jhakaas'!
They may have played onscreen father and son but in real life, they are buddies who know how to come together and have fun. Anil Kapoor and Ranveer Singh are two people who can entertain anyone and everyone with their camaraderie.
The duo acted together in Zoya Akhtar's Dil Dhadakne Do and will be seen together in KJo's upcoming magnum opus Takht.
Anil Kapoor and Janhvi Kapoor were show-stoppers for Raghavendra Rathore at the Lakme Fashion Week but it was Ranveer Singh who hogged the limelight.
Ranveer (like always) made a surprise entry with Anil Kapoor and Janhvi Kapoor and together, they started dancing and having fun-converting a usual ramp walk into an entertaining live show.
Here is what happened when Ranveer Singh turned into Anil Kapoor's Cheer-leader and they soon started dancing, making the ramp-walk a fun live show. Here's what happened.
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
With the kind of energy levels they both have, it'd be unfair to not cast them together, isn't it?
title: Ranveer Singh-Anil Kapoor's Impromptu Dance On The Ramp Was Absolutely 'Jhakaas'!

Ranveer (like always) made a surprise entry with Anil Kapoor and Janhvi Kapoor and together, they started dancing and having fun-converting a usual ramp walk into an entertaining live show.
